titleStmt.title: The test and tryal of medicines and the different modes of medical practice. Shewing what hopes of help, from physick and physicians. By E.M. Med. D.
titleStmt.author: Maynwaringe, Everard, 1628-1699?

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Thomas Basset, at the George in Fleetstreet; and Thomas Horne, at the South-entrance of the Royal-Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Signed on A4v: E. Maynwaringe. Includes an advertisement at the foot of A4v.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
